zh: 罗恩接着说：“让我们离开这里。”
en: Then Ron said, "Let's get out of here."

zh: “我们不应该尝试帮助吗？” Harry尴尬地开始。
en: "Shouldn't we try and help -" Harry began awkwardly.
"Trust me," said Ron.
"We don't want to be found here."
But it was too late.

en: A rumble, as though of distant thunder, told them that
the feast had just ended.
